fixed_skill.desc:
Deal Gun damage to 1 foe equal to 203.3%/221.6%/239.9% of Attack. 75% chance to inflict Marked for 2 turns.
Marked: Decrease Defense by 29.6%/32.3%/34.9%.
fixed_skill.name: Tatra Shot

innate_skill.desc: Deal Gun damage to all foes equal to 23.4%/25.5%/27.7% of Attack (3 hits). If a foe is Marked, increase damage by 30.0%/32.7%/35.4% and critical damage by 36.0%/39.2%/42.5%.
innate_skill.name: Bullet Time

innate_skill.desc: Deal Bless damage to all foes equal to 78.8%/85.9%/93.0% of Attack. Restore HP of the ally with the lowest remaining HP, equal to 15.8%/17.2%/18.6% of Attack + 478/614/765.
innate_skill.name: Seize the Day

innate_skill.desc: Restore 2.5% of max HP and SP after winning a battle.
innate_skill.name: Life Aid I

passive_skill.desc: Increase Attack by 4.2%. When any ally attacks a Marked foe, increase Attack by 20%.
passive_skill.name: Hunting

passive_skill.desc: Increase Attack by 12.5%. At the start of battle, Mark a foe. When any ally attacks a Marked foe, increase Attack by 20%.
passive_skill.name: Hunting I

passive_skill.desc: Increase Attack by 20.8%. At the start of battle, Mark a foe. When any ally attacks a Marked foe, increase Attack by 20%. When user attacks a Marked foe, deal bonus Gun damage equal to 18% of Attack 1 time.
passive_skill.name: Hunting II

passive_skill.desc: Increase Attack by 29.1%. At the start of battle, Mark a foe. When all allies attack a Marked foe, increase Attack by 20%. Decrease Marked foes' Defense by 12% more. When user attacks a Marked foe, deal bonus Gun damage equal to 18% of Attack 1 time.
passive_skill.name: Hunting III

showtime_skill.desc: Deal Gun damage to 1 foe equal to 360.0%/385.2%/410.4% of Attack.
showtime_skill.name: Highlight
